attributes.action: Grant a posthumous Knighthood to Bobby Moore
attributes.background: Bobby Moore captained the England football team in the 1966 World Cup, culminating in winning the World Cup final. To-date this achievement has yet to be matched. He is an exponent of leadership a gentleman and a model sportsman. Todays game as a whole will benefit by posthumously awarding this KBE.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

We could accept a petition calling on the Government and Parliament to reform the honours system, so that knighthoods can be awarded posthumously.
